title: Drawing, "End Table"
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/ NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower right corner: SCALE 1 1/2"=1'0" [underlined]/7622 [circled]; inscribed in red color pencil in lower right corner: P; inscribed with dimensions throughout.
description: Perspective drawing of end table in upper right corner of drawing with elevations at the left. Small, rectangular unit with one drawer above four, long straight legs. Side panels on drawer extend beyond the top of the unit and curve outward. Two wavy decorative lines on extended panel above surface. Legs have incised (?) linear decoration.
